physical_examinations.relevant_findings: A mental status examination revealed a melancholy older woman with little spontaneous movement. Her speech pattern had low tone and high latency. She had a flat affect and reported poor concentration. MMSE score was 28/30.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At her 15-month visit, she demonstrated a full range of depression symptoms with an MMSE score of 16, indicating a decline in cognitive function. At the 18-month visit, her MMSE score improved to 21, but she still had significant cognitive difficulties. At her 24-month visit, her MMSE score remained at 25 but reflected ongoing issues with orientation and command following.
